snippet: Jack Johnson scored his second goal of the game 1:47 into overtime to lift the United States to a 5-4 win over Canada at the hockey world championships in Helsinki, Finland.
abstract: United States defeats Canada, 5-4, at ice hockey world championships.
lead_paragraph: Jack Johnson scored his second goal of the game 1:47 into overtime to lift the United States to a 5-4 win over Canada at the hockey world championships in Helsinki, Finland.

headline.main: U.S. Defeats Canada at Hockey World Championships
headline.print_headline: U.S. Defeats Canada at World Championships
